channel.title: What is the Radix Roadmap?
channel.description:
Following the launch of the Alexandria release in December 2021, developers have the opportunity to build Dapps and execute them in a simulated environment.
These Dapps & smart contracts will be deployable on the Radix mainnet from the Babylon release, planned for late 2022.
Xi'an release in 2023 will introduce sharding to the network, providing infinite scalability and cross shard atomic composability.
https://learn.radixdlt.com/article/what-is-the-radix-roadmap
